text: Maria del Carmen Chaves Calvo (born January 13, 1967 in Hospitalet de Llobregat) is a cyclist from Spain. She has a disability: She is blind. She competed at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. She finished third in the tandem road race. == References == Category:Spanish cyclists Category:Living people Category:1967 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople from Catalonia
